info.name: Submittal Management
info.description:
CONSOLIDATED Submittal Management API collection with 8 streamlined endpoints for efficient submittal lifecycle management.

üéØ CONSOLIDATED ENDPOINTS (8 total):

Core CRUD Operations:
  - GET    /submittals/{id}                                    Get submittal with all data (attachments, reviews)
  - POST   /submittals                                         Create submittal
  - PUT    /submittals/{id}                                    Update submittal (including soft delete)

Context Query:
  - GET    /contexts/{contextType}/{contextId}/submittals     Get submittals for project

Workflow Operations:
  - POST   /submittals/{id}/workflow                          Execute workflow action

Statistics & Export:
  - GET    /contexts/{contextType}/{contextId}/submittals/stats Get submittal statistics
  - GET    /contexts/{contextType}/{contextId}/submittals/export Export submittals

File Management:
  - POST   /submittals/{id}/attachments                       Add attachment

‚úÖ ACTION-BASED WORKFLOW (Consolidated in PUT /submittals/{id} or POST /submittals/{id}/workflow):
1. Create Submittal: POST /submittals (PENDING_SUBMISSION status)
2. Submit for Review: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="submit_for_review"
3. Approve: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="approve" + comments
4. Approve as Noted: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="approve_as_noted" + comments + conditions
5. Revise & Resubmit: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="revise_resubmit" + revision_notes (required)
6. Reject: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="reject" + comments (required)
7. Mark for Information: POST /submittals/{id}/workflow with action="mark_for_information"
8. Regular Update: PUT /submittals/{id} without action field

üìã SUBMITTAL TYPES & STATUSES (UI Compatible):
- Types: shop_drawings, product_data, samples, material_certificates, method_statements, test_reports, other
- Priorities: critical, high, medium, low
- Phases: preparation, review, approval, fabrication, delivery, installation, completed
- Statuses: pending_submission, under_review, approved, approved_as_noted, revise_resubmit, rejected, for_information_only
- Ball in Court: contractor, architect, engineer, owner, subcontractor, vendor
- Actions: submit_for_review, approve, approve_as_noted, revise_resubmit, reject, mark_for_information

üîê SECURITY IMPROVEMENTS:
- Organization ID extracted from JWT token (not request body)
- Project validation happens server-side
- Enhanced data integrity constraints
- Unified request structure for create/update operations

üîß TESTING NOTES:
- Use ID tokens (not access tokens) for API Gateway
- Test with: buildboard007+555@gmail.com | Mayur@1234
- Ensure project_id exists before creating submittals
- All dates should use YYYY-MM-DD format
- Submittal numbers are auto-generated if not provided
- Uses snake_case field names to match UI expectations
- Complex JSON objects for delivery_tracking, team_assignments, etc.

üöÄ CONSOLIDATION BENEFITS:
- Reduced API endpoints from 15+ to 10
- Action-based workflow changes consolidate submit/approve/reject/respond
- Simplified maintenance and testing
- Consistent with other management APIs (RFI, Issue, Assignment)
- Respects API Gateway limits
